name: @braintrust/lingua
description: TypeScript bindings for Lingua - Universal message format for LLM APIs

scripts.build:wasm: cd ../.. && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-dir bindings/typescript/wasm --no-pack && (command -v wasm-opt >/dev/null 2>&1 && wasm-opt -Oz bindings/typescript/wasm/lingua_bg.wasm -o bindings/typescript/wasm/lingua_bg.wasm || echo 'wasm-opt not found, skipping optimization')
